PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09792020-12-04,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act and the Fuel Charge Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending PART 1 OF SCHEDULE 1 AND SCHEDULE 2 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT (GGPPA) AND THE FUEL CHARGE REGULATIONS in order to cease the application of the fuel charge in New Brunswick effective April 1, 2020 by removing the references to the province from Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the GGPPA and the Fuel Charge Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0261 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act and the Fuel Charge Regulations
precis: Regulations amending PART 1 OF SCHEDULE 1 AND SCHEDULE 2 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT (GGPPA) AND THE FUEL CHARGE REGULATIONS in order to cease the application of the fuel charge in New Brunswick effective April 1, 2020 by removing the references to the province from Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the GGPPA and the Fuel Charge Regulations.
